issue.title: otvet.mail.ru

labels.name: Extra
labels.description: Issues, related to AdGuard Extra extension

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
Включите расширение AdGuard Extra в настройках программы.

---

Пользователям браузерного расширения нужно установить скрипт `AdGuard Extra`. Для этого понадобится браузерное расширение-скриптоприёмник `Tampermonkey`

Ссылка на `AdGuard Extra`
https://userscripts.adtidy.org/beta/adguard-extra/1.0/adguard-extra.user.js

После установки скрипта нужно будет зайти в настройки `Tampermonkey`, включить режим эксперта, переключить режим встраивания на `мгновенный` и перезапустить расширение:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8361299/62641343-07248e00-b94c-11e9-9775-9854a7922889.png)

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8361299/62641299-f7a54500-b94b-11e9-8a83-885d89abbeec.png)

labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
Включите расширение AdGuard Extra в настройках программы.

---

Пользователям браузерного расширения нужно установить скрипт `AdGuard Extra`. Для этого понадобится браузерное расширение-скриптоприёмник `Tampermonkey`

Ссылка на `AdGuard Extra`
https://userscripts.adtidy.org/beta/adguard-extra/1.0/adguard-extra.user.js

После установки скрипта нужно будет зайти в настройки `Tampermonkey`, включить режим эксперта, переключить режим встраивания на `мгновенный` и перезапустить расширение:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8361299/62641343-07248e00-b94c-11e9-9775-9854a7922889.png)

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8361299/62641299-f7a54500-b94b-11e9-8a83-885d89abbeec.png)

comment.body: Посмотрите первый пост.

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

comment.body:
@d0x360 It seems that it may be caused by `Fanboy's Enhanced Tracking List`, so please disable it or add this rule:
```
@@||nydailynews.com^$generichide,badfilter
```
to user rules and then check again.

comment.body:
This video player is loading after a while, so I guess that it may still occurs.
This rule:
```
||d3mmnnn9s2dcmq.cloudfront.net^$domain=nydailynews.com
```
should block it (clearing cache may be required), but I'm not sure if it will not block some useful video players on this website.

>To help me better understand when something like this happens how do I tell what filter list is or may be the issue?

For example, you can check filtering log and search for `$generichide` (it should be highlighted in green and if you click on it then there should be information from which filter lists it comes from), this exception disables generic cosmetic rules and may cause that some ad placeholders will be not blocked.
It's usually used to fix anti-adblock issues.

>Then once I know do I still report that to you or should I notify Fanboys?

If you know, that issue is caused by third-party filter then I think that it would be better to report it to maintainers of this filter list.

labels.name: A: Problematic

issue.body:
Включите расширение AdGuard Extra в настройках программы.

---

Пользователям браузерного расширения нужно установить скрипт `AdGuard Extra`. Для этого понадобится браузерное расширение-скриптоприёмник `Tampermonkey`

Ссылка на `AdGuard Extra`
https://userscripts.adtidy.org/beta/adguard-extra/1.0/adguard-extra.user.js

После установки скрипта нужно будет зайти в настройки `Tampermonkey`, включить режим эксперта, переключить режим встраивания на `мгновенный` и перезапустить расширение:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8361299/62641343-07248e00-b94c-11e9-9775-9854a7922889.png)

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8361299/62641299-f7a54500-b94b-11e9-8a83-885d89abbeec.png)

comment.body:
@zloyden 

This script is also used in `720pizle.io` Maybe there are on more websites.
Don't limit it to domain names. Use generic as before so like below

```
||ceviz.pw/pop.php
||filese.me/pop.php
```

Also, close low quality PRs like #119358 without merge them. Obviously, PR owner doesn't know how to check for dead sites.
These PRs do nothing but increase the workload of the developers.

Other than that, don't remove existing rules. The site may have ads again later. Rules can be deleted only if the website is permanently down.
